title: Hi This is the 4th time I\'ve asked this question and will continue to do so until I get an answer. I live downtown and wonder why there are so many dead birds by the BBT building on Third St.? Is it because of the mirrored glass? At any given time you can find at least 3 or 4 dead birds on the sidewalk surrounding this building. Why?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8588
